name: Vivecraft Spigot Extensions - 1.16.X
body:
NOTE: If you have a BungeeCord network you also need this plugin on the proxy server (https://github.com/Techjar/Vivecraft_BungeeCord_Extensions/releases) 1.16.5 r1 (1/24/2021) - Update version to 1.16.5 (no changes from 1.16.4) 1.16.4 r1 (11/9/2020) - Update to 1.16.4 - Not backwards compatible. 1.16.3 r1 (9/16/2020) - Build against spigot 1.16.3 1.16.2 r3 (9/15/2020) - Fix projectile issue on latest versions of Paper. 1.16.2 r2 (8/20/2020) - Update to 1.16.2. Note: NOT backwards compatible.
1.16.1 Notes r7 (8/5/2020) - Fix arrows and other projectiles launching from the wrong position r6 (8/5/2020) - Fix server-side raytraces (e.g. buckets) r5 (8/4/2020) - Support roomscale crawling - Support localized item names - Add metadata on players for other plugins to use. See https://github.com/jrbudda/Vivecraft_Spigot_Extensions#metadata r4 (7/28/2020) - Fix endermen and creepers again. As usual. r3 (7/27/2020) - Update to 1.16.1

name: Vivecraft Spigot Extensions - 1.15.X
body:
**NOTE:** If you have a BungeeCord network you also need this plugin on the proxy server (https://github.com/Techjar/Vivecraft_BungeeCord_Extensions/releases)

r7 (5/23/2020)
 - Setting a single permission node to '' will disable that node and suppress any errors about the group not existing.

r6 (5/11/2020)
 - Fix group permissions not being set on desktop players.
 - Add better error messages for group setting.
 - Add crafting recipe for telescope.
 - Add setting to disable vivecraft crafting recipes.

r5 (4/30/2020)
 - Fix a bug.
 - Add code to make ghast-fireball-deflection more consistent in VR. Uses hmd look now.

r4 (4/27/2020)
 - Better handling of projectile aiming, allows both hands. Needs updated client as well.

r3 (4/3/2020)
 - Fix creepers

r2 (4/3/2020)
 - Update to 1.15.2
 - Added bStats metrics, removed mcstats which died like 2 years ago
 - Added option to allow opped players to bypass the vr-only check if it's enabled.
 - Added support to fire some projectiles from the off-hand using the off-hand aim if the server actually knows which hand.

name: Vivecraft Spigot Extensions - 1.14.X
body:
<details><summary>Initial Release (7/2/2019)</summary>

 - Update to 1.14.3
</details>
<details><summary>Revision 2 (7/2/2019)</summary>

 - Fix creepers only wanting hugs
</details>
<details><summary>Revision 3 (7/12/2019)</summary>

 - Fix bow aim off for non-standard arrows
</details>
<details><summary>Revision 5 (7/21/2019)</summary>

 - Update to 1.14.4
 - Fix monster AI changes not actually working
 - Improve enderman aggro calculations
 - Allow sending commands from the console because duh
 - Improve debug mode messages
</details>

<details><summary>Revision 6 (8/2/2019)</summary>

 - Fix welcome message only working for VR players.
</details>

name: Vivecraft Spigot Extensions - 1.13.2
body:
<details><summary>Revision 6 - Initial Release </summary>

 - Update to 1.13.2
 - Better handling of projectile direction on the server.
</details>
<details><summary>Revision 7 (3/4/2019)</summary>

 - Disabled setting permission groups by default. Enable in the config if you want this feature.
</details>
<details><summary>Revision 8  (3/8/2019)</summary>

 - Fix getting kicked for 'flying' while using Climb Claws in certain situations.
</details>

name: Vivecraft Spigot Extensions - 1.12.2
body:
<details><summary>1.12.2 v7 (3/20/2018)</summary>

*Please only use this plugin with builds of Spigot from after January 2018*
 - Fix recipe deprecation warning.
 - Revert arrow spawn / chunk boundary workaround so arrows spawn instantly again. Requires updated build of Spigot or arrow might disappear if fired over a chunk boundary.
</details>

<details><summary>1.12.2 v8 (3/9/2019)</summary>

 - disable permission group feature by default
 - better handle arrow direction in some situations (i.e. elytra)
 - Fix 'flying' kick while using climb claw in specific situations.
</details>

name: Vivecraft Spigot Extensions - Legacy Versions (1.10, 1.11, 1.12)
body:
1.12.X v6 (2/8/2018)
 - Support for toggling off Roomscale Bow.

1.12.X v5 (12/8/2017)
 - Fix permission groups not being set.
 - Fix some message issues.

1.12.X v4 (11/24/2017)
Synchronize VR Player handling with integrated LAN server. Fire arrow in right direction in more situations. Check for updates only once, asynchronously.

1.10.2 v3, 1.11.2 v9, 1.12.2 v3
Fix issue with arrows despawning when fired over chunk boundaries.

name: VSE 1.10-1.12
body:
1.12 plugin
1.11 point at new url for updates
1.10 same

name: [1.10.2 / 1.11.2] VSE
body:
Updating plugin for 1.10.2 spigot. 1.11.2 version is the same.

1.10.2 r2.5 update: fix enderman crash(s)

name: [1.11/1.11.2] VSE v8 - Oh, Hello.
body:
- Fix several bugs with wrong join messages
 - Added join message for vanilla players (muggles)
 - Blanking a join message or removing the entry will disable that message.
 - Join messages now disabled by default.
 - Default join messages make more sense.
 - vive-only-kickwaittime now clamped to the range 100-1000 (10 was too short)
 - /vive list now usable by anyone.
 - Moved the update check to my repo.

name: [1.11/1.11.2] VSE v7 - Can't touch this.
body:
- Add new climbey options for server owners. You can now either whitelist only certainly blocks for climbing, or blacklist certain blocks from climbing. Should allow you to setup your server how you want for most players while supporting some kind of climb-courses.
 - Plugin now outputs a config-instructions.yml which has comments in it. Make sure you actually edit config.yml.
 - Don't save config on plugin disable.

name: [1.11/1.11.2] VSE v6 - Hang in there, baby
body:
Updated to r1 to fix boots recipe. Will show up in game as 6 instead of 6beta37.

Thanks to Jaron780 for his contributions to VSE.
- Support climbeymotion. 
  - Clear fall damage while climbing, very important.
  - Adds crafting recipes for climbeymotion items.
- New direct-teleport support. Skips anti-cheat checks. This will all allow us to put the 'moved-wrongly' thresholds back to normal values and still support teleporting. Clients must update to version 6 of Vivecraft.
- Added /vse list command to show all players on the server and how they're playing (VR, seated, etc)
- Discord user cool_nick_name has added in 'headshot' bow options to increase bow damage for accuracy. Check out the config.yml for details.
- Jaron has added a whole range of options to prevent PVP between vr and non vr situations. Check out the config.yml for details.
- Added /vse set to set a config.yml option from in-game

name: [1.11/1.11.2] VSE v5 - You Complete Me.
body:
## update v6b - fix crash if server has multiple worlds.

From the desk of jaron780:
- Autocomplete /vive or /vse commands
- Differentiate Vivecraft and Vivecraft NonVR Companion players.
- Configurable welcome messages.

name: [1.11] VSE v4 - I'm Mr. Meeseeks!
body:
- Endermen properly aggro VR players based on look direction
- Notification for new versions of the plugin
- Integrated mcstats

name: [1.11] VSE v3 - At Your Command
body:
jaron780, aka invalid-email-address, is delighted to provide you with this update.
- Update for Spigot 1.11
- Adds /vse alias in addition to /vive

name: [1.10.2] VSE v2 - Never Let Go
body:
This update entirely courtesy of jaron780.
- Dropped items spawn at the controller and fly in the correct direction
- Thrown projectiles go the right way.
- Creeper ignite radius shrunk from 3 to 1.75m (configurable)
- Bow damage multiplier now configurable
- Option to turn off sending all the player arm/head data (but why would you want to?)

name: [1.10.2] VSE v1
body:
Initial release of the 'official' vivecraft plugin for spigot servers on 1.10. 

Features
- Enables client-side animation of vivecraft players' arms and heads by passing device data to all mod players.
- Sets the 'moved wrongly' and 'moved too quickly' settings automatically to large values. Overrides the setting in your spigot.yml.
- Makes Archery work exactly the same as single player. Handles corrected arrow spawn location, aim, velocity, and damage.
- Option to make server 'vive-only' and kick non-vivecraft players after a specified time.
- Sets seperate permission groups for vive players in free move, vive players in teleport, and non-vive players.

See the config.yml comments for configuration.
